metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7312 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple race conditions in the Advanced Union Filesystem (aufs)aufs3-mmap.patch and aufs4-mmap.patch patches for the Linux kernel 3.x and4.x allow local users to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and BUG)or possibly gain privileges via a (1) madvise or (2) msync system call,related to mm/madvise.c and mm/msync.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7312` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-66-generic - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-lowlatency - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-3.13.0-66-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-66.108
linux-image-extra-3.13.0-66-generic - 3.13.0-66.108
No subscription required

linux-image-3.16.0-51-generic - 3.16.0-51.69~14.04.1
linux-image-3.16.0-51-generic-lpae - 3.16.0-51.69~14.04.1

No subscription required

linux-image-3.19.0-31-generic - 3.19.0-31.36~14.04.1

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-66.108').
